thread.title: VladimirPutin

author: VladimirPutin
title: VladimirPutin
text:
I still can not believe I have got a game so cheap and so fast! One second I was paying the other I have seen the key ready for me to use.
Although I would change something about the payment or at least the prices on the search pages, so you know how much the game will really cost if you are paying with credit/debit card or paypal or paysafe. I wanted to buy another game, but I was 0.19€ short, so I couldn't buy it (Got so happy when I saw it was only 8.19, until I figured out I had to pay 2 more for paying via paypal).
Nontheless a great experience, the game I chose was cheap and the service is fast and amazing!
